title: Composite Pattern and Bridge Pattern
ques:
Composite Pattern is one of the most useful design patterns, but it can cause many design problems. 
Apparently, the Bridge Pattern can solve one of the problems caused by Composite. 

Does anyone know: What is it? How it was solved?

Thanks in advance.

answers.ans:
Yang: 

Did you ever find an answer to your question? 

I would be curious to know what exactly the many design problems are with the Composite pattern.
As you mentioned, Composite is useful and widely used, and I am not sure what kind of problem you are referring to.

Thanks, 
Dan.
